Message:
Did I just hear
the words “Witch Hunt...?”
From the one who treasured
and loved life so much...?

As my trembling voice
called out to her,
an inhuman smile
spread across her face.

“Perfect.
You’ll be the one to take
command of the Witch Hunt.”

“You seem like you’d have
the loveliest of screams.

Use those hands and see to it
that there’s not a single drop
of filthy witch blood left
in this world.”

“You’ll be the witch who
massacres all witches.
Isn’t that the greatest
pleasure of all?!”

Is this the Lady Elfriede I know?
She seems like a completely
different person...

“Then, when you’re
the last one left,
I will watch as you die.”

After whispering those words
into my ear, she left my sight,
her laughter echoing with scorn.

I was utterly helpless...
unable to chase after her
or object against her order...

After all, if she were to
abandon me, I...
